description: Enterprise techniques used by DUSTPAN, ATT&CK software S1158 (v1.0)
name: DUSTPAN (S1158)

techniques.comment: [DUSTPAN](https://attack.mitre.org/software/S1158) can persist as a Windows Service in operations.(Citation: Google Cloud APT41 2024)
[DUSTPAN](https://attack.mitre.org/software/S1158) decodes and decrypts embedded payloads.(Citation: Google Cloud APT41 2024)
[DUSTPAN](https://attack.mitre.org/software/S1158) is often disguised as a legitimate Windows binary such as `w3wp.exe` or `conn.exe`.(Citation: Google Cloud APT41 2024)
[DUSTPAN](https://attack.mitre.org/software/S1158) decrypts and executes an embedded payload.(Citation: Google Cloud APT41 2024)(Citation: Google Cloud APT41 2022)
[DUSTPAN](https://attack.mitre.org/software/S1158) decrypts an embedded payload.(Citation: Google Cloud APT41 2024)(Citation: Google Cloud APT41 2022)
[DUSTPAN](https://attack.mitre.org/software/S1158) can inject its decrypted payload into another process.(Citation: Google Cloud APT41 2024)
